q: Is this action codeblock 1) a step towards resolving the problems identified in the orientation block 2) simple 3) with appropriate tool use?
description: An action block that defines a function 'patch_text' to repair the 'NEW_MESSAGE.md' file using a unidiff patch. The function uses the 'editor-NEW_MESSAGE.md' tool to apply the unidiff, which includes corrections to the text. The action is added to the weave-agent with the title 'Repair NEW_MESSAGE.md' and referencing the function name patch_text.
